typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as date,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation as date,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Predicted_SE_Other as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence as decimal(19,4),
		Actual_SE_Other as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectKeyColumnsForDelete
SelectKeyColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string ("2020-08-28T06:05:53.4181322Z"),
	CurrentRunDateTime as string ("2020-08-01"),
	WorkbookName as string ("Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx"),
	TabName as string ("Major Severe Incidents"),
	CurrentQuarterDate as string ("2020-06-30"),
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Incident_Type as string,
		Category as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Incident_Type_Code\n      ,Incident_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsIncidentType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Incident_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Incident_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncident
LookupIncidentType derive(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp), "Incident Type Lookup Error/", ""),
		Incident_Date_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Date), "Blank Incident Date/", ""),
		Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Severity), "Blank Incident Severity/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Incident_Id),"Null Incident ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Incident_ID_Lkp)),iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Incident ID does not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Incident_Type_Validate_Msg,Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg, Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 &&
(not(isNull(Incident_Id)) || not(isNull(Incident_Type)) || not(isNull(Incident_Severity)) ||
not(isNull(Incident_Description)) || not(isNull(Investigation_Undertaken)) || not(isNull(Incident_Findings)) || not(isNull(Incident_Date))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Incident_Type_Code_Lkp = Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Type_Lkp = Incident_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentTypeLkp
LookupIncidents, SelectIncidentTypeLkp lookup(Incident_Type == Incident_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidentType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalIncident select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Incident_ID_Lkp = Incident_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectIncidentLkp lookup(Incident_Id == Incident_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidents
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Operation_Type as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Cost_of_Treatment as string,
		Average_Unit_Cost as string,
		Budget_Area_Treated as string,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Cost as string,
		variation_Area_Treated as string,
		variation_Treatment_Cost as string,
		variation_Unit_Cost as string,
		Date_Last_Age_Class_Established as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Project_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Deliverable_Project_Weighting as string,
		Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Percent_Complete as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as short,
		Expected_Completion_Date as date,
		Planned_Completion_Date as date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as short,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Project_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Primary_Management_Activity]\n      ,[Project_Objectives]\n      ,[Expected_Value_Impact]\n      ,[Deliverable]\n      ,[Project_Weighting]\n      ,[Expected_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Planned_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Current_Progress_Perc_Complete]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Strategic_Project]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp
LookupStrategicProject derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Project_ID),"Null Project ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Project_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Project ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity), "Primary Management Activity/",""),
		ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate)),"","Expected Completion Date/"),"Expected Completion Date/"),
		PlannedCompletionValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate)),"","Planned Completion Date/"),"Planned Completion Date/")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg,
PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg, ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg, PlannedCompletionValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg, 
PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg, ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg, PlannedCompletionValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate = toDate(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date),
		Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate = toDate(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date),
		Project_Weighting = toShort(Deliverable_Project_Weighting),
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(toDecimal(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete, 3, 2) * 100),
		Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime_Lkp) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Project_ID_Lkp = Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity_Lkp = Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives_Lkp = Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact_Lkp = Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable_Lkp = Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting_Lkp = Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date_Lkp = Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date_Lkp = Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete_Lkp = Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime_Lkp = Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStrategicProjectsLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectStrategicProjectsLkp lookup(Project_ID == Project_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupStrategicProject
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity)) || not(isNull(Project_Objectives)) || 
not(isNull(Expected_Value_Impact)) || not(isNull(Deliverable)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Project_Weighting)) || 
not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate
